label: AB4C3_oI32_46_b_2bc_bc-001
title: Room Temperature AgC$_{4}$N$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
This is the room temperature structure of AgC$_{4}$N$_{3}$.  Around 100K it undergoes a significatn change in structure which does not change the space group or Wyckoff positions. (Hodgson, 2014).  This can be found on the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C3_oI32_46_b_2bc_bc-002}{low temperature AgC$_{4}$N$_{3}$ structure} page. 
 In chemical literature this is often referred to as Ag(tcm), where tcm is an abbreviation for tricyanomethanide. 
 (Konnert, 2014) swapped the $x$- and $z$-axes compared to the standard setting of space group $Ima2$ \#46.  We used AFLOW to transform this to the standard orientation.
